title: Redux
content: Designed to work with React's component model. You define how to extract the values your component needs from Redux, and your component updates automatically as needed.

title: Utility Classes
content: As front-end developers, we're always looking for ways to optimize our code and streamline our processes. CSS is no different. If you've spent a considerable amount of time working on projects you've most likely created a pattern library. Pattern libraries are essential in driving consistency across multiple products and streamlining development, but writing CSS for large codebases can be tricky and quite cumbersome.

title: React Router
content: Closing in on a decade of client-side routing, React Router v6 takes the best features from previous versionsâ€”and its sister project.

title: Pug Iteration
content: Pug supports two primary methods of iteration: each and while.

title: Middleware
content: Express is a routing and middleware web framework that has minimal functionality of its own: An Express application is essentially a series of middleware.
